channel.title: Wheezy on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Wheezy on Notes

item.title: Sources List for Debian Wheezy
item.description: As Debian wheezy version has reached the end of life, the usual repositories do not exist anymore and have been moved to the archive. Open /etc/apt/sources.list Comment existing sources Add below sources deb http://archive.debian.org/debian/ wheezy main non-free contrib deb-src http://archive.debian.org/debian/ wheezy main non-free contrib Now you can run apt-get update If you get below error There is no public key available for the following key IDs Install below package apt-get install debian-archive-keyring Now you can rerun apt-get update
